Captain Pants with Peg Leg (Female)
kDesc
Lucky for you, you'll only have to worry about polishing one boot. [#Legal]
Vous avez de la chance : une seule botte à cirer. [#Legal]
Zum Glück muss man ab jetzt nur noch einen Stiefel polieren. [#Legal]
Per tua fortuna, dovrai lucidare solo uno stivale. [#Legal]
Así solo tienes que preocuparte de sacarle brillo a una bota. [#Legal]
한쪽 구두만 닦으면 되니 당신은 꽤 운이 좋군요. [#Legal]
Lucky for you, you'll only have to worry about polishing one boot. [#Legal]
您很幸運，因為您只要煩惱如何穿一隻靴子。 [#Legal]
您很幸運，因為您只要煩惱如何穿一隻靴子。 [#Legal]
Lucky for you, you'll only have to worry about polishing one boot. [#Legal]
